page.title: 17RECREATION ON ALSTON MOOR
page.content: In Alston we don't have many spectator sports.We lack spectator facilities, and sports clubs are unable to provide these because of limited funds. The spectator sports are cricket, golf, football, rugby and bowling. Only the bowling club has seating available. The winter indoor games are badminton,bingo and whist.Badminton and whist are in the winter only,while bingo is all the year round.Darts and pool are played regularly in most pubs.Chess and Bridge Clubs meet twice a week in the Blue Bell Inn. Most clubs are well supported and matches are played against clubs in neighbouring towns and villages.
